video.title: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan Demon Capital
video.synopsis: By night, teenage Rikuo becomes a form of demon called yokai, preparing to fulfill his destiny as the head of his legendary yokai clan.

episodes.synopsis: Young Rikuo resists becoming the new heir of the Nura Clan because of their reputation for trouble, until a tragedy changes his mind.
episodes.title: The Nura Clan’s Third Heir Awakens

episodes.synopsis: Yura's older brother and a childhood friend arrive in Ukiyoe Town, but Yura is unable to protect Rikuo when they claim hatred of the Yokai.
episodes.title: Two Justice

episodes.synopsis: When Rikuo defends himself with a sword that kills only Yokai, Ryuji reveals his true purpose to Yura. Rikuo also tells her that he's human by day.
episodes.title: Yura's Realization

episodes.synopsis: As a young man, Nurarihyon falls in love with a princess with healing powers whose father holds her captive, but the story takes a tragic turn.
episodes.title: Nurarihyon and Princess Yo

episodes.synopsis: After saving Princess Yo from Osaka Castle, Nurarihyon is dubbed Lord of Pandemonium and the Nura Clan's supremacy is acknowledged.
episodes.title: Towards Today

episodes.synopsis: Nurarihyon is concerned when Rikuo announces plans to join the Paranormal Patrol on a field trip to Yura's home in Kyoto.
episodes.title: The Legends of Tono

episodes.synopsis: When a band of Kyoto Yokai confronts Rikuo, he manipulates the balance of fear in the battle, one of Nurarihyon's skills he's learned under Itaku.
episodes.title: Kyokasuigetsu

episodes.synopsis: As Hagoromo-Gitsune breaks the Keikain seals in Kyoto one by one, Rikuo trains to fight the Kyoto Yokai, who've wiped out the onmyoji.
episodes.title: Hagoromo-Gitsune Kyoto Invasion

episodes.synopsis: His training done, Rikuo returns to Ukiyoe Town. A proud Nurarihyon allows him to go to Kyoto and promises he'll be dubbed the Nura Clan's Third Heir.
episodes.title: The Grey Onmyoji

episodes.synopsis: Akifusa's jealousy at Yura's ascent leads to possession by Minagoroshi Jizo, which Yura herself must defeat with her Hagun technique.
episodes.title: Hagun

episodes.synopsis: With only one seal standing between Kyoto Yokai and victory, Rikuo and members of Nura Clan attempt an assault from their flying ship.
episodes.title: Battle Above Kyoto

episodes.synopsis: When the battle with the Kyoto Yokai leaves their flying ship badly crippled, Rikuo and his crew race to prevent it from crashing to the city below.
episodes.title: Long-Standing Wish

episodes.synopsis: As the Nura Clan, Tono Yokai and Keikain Onmyoji prepare to battle Hagoromo-Gitsune and the Kyoto Yokai, the heroes reflect on their past.
episodes.title: The Destiny of the Demon Capital
